attributes.action: Demand the resignation of, or replace current Sports Minister Nigel Huddlestone
attributes.additional_details:
The reason for this is we as the sporting community of the UK have lost all faith in his ability to carry out the role.
A sports minister should be an advocate for sport and see the benefits that sport exercise and fitness  has on the UK population.
Nigel Huddlestone was asked in Parliament to make sporting establishments essential ensuring we would remain open should be enter another national lockdown. 
He failed in his duty to answer this very simple question left many, bitterly disappointed
attributes.background: The People of the UK are extremely unhappy with the current sports minister Nigel Huddlestone and we would like him to resign immediately or be replaced

rejection.details:
We can't publish petitions about honours or appointments. That includes calling for Ministers to be sacked or to resign.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or the House of Commons, you could sign or start a petition about that.
